snippet: On Wednesday, Mr. Colbert introduced an online presence for his “Late Show,” including a video, a Twitter feed, a Facebook page, a YouTube page, and an iOS application called Colbr.
abstract: On Wednesday, Mr. Colbert introduced an online presence for his “Late Show,” including a video, a Twitter feed, a Facebook page, a YouTube page, and an iOS application called Colbr.

headline.main: Stephen Colbert Debuts ‘Late Show’ Video, Podcast and More
headline.print_headline: Colbert Beefs Up Social and Loses the Beard
